ui.heroDesc: Unforgettable moments with raki-fish, oven kebab, and fresh appetizers
ui.setNote: Set menus are for a minimum of 2 people
ui.grilledNote: Grilled items are served with 5 types of cold appetizers and salad
ui.fishNote: Fish items are served with 5 types of cold appetizers and salad
ui.beverageNote: All soft drinks are served cold
ui.alcoholNote: Alcohol served only to customers aged 18 and over

coldMeze.name: COLD APPETIZER SET (12 VARIETIES)
coldMeze.desc: A selection of 12 different fresh appetizers prepared with traditional recipes.

coldMeze.name: HUMMUS
coldMeze.desc: Silky smooth blend of golden tahini and carefully boiled chickpeas.

coldMeze.name: YOGURT
coldMeze.desc: Full-fat, village-style strained yogurt from our local region.

coldMeze.name: TZATZIKI
coldMeze.desc: A refreshing harmony of fresh cucumbers, garlic, and mint.

coldMeze.name: TAHINI
coldMeze.desc: Authentic Cyprus-style tahini flavored with plenty of lemon and garlic.

coldMeze.name: HAYDARI
coldMeze.desc: A thick, flavorful yogurt dip blended with fresh dill and special spices.

coldMeze.name: RUSSIAN SALAD
coldMeze.desc: A classic starter of vegetables tossed in creamy homemade mayonnaise.

coldMeze.name: BEAN SALAD (PIYAZ)
coldMeze.desc: A white bean feast with onions, parsley, olive oil, and vinegar.

coldMeze.name: CARROT TARATOR
coldMeze.desc: Lightly sautéed carrots meeting with strained yogurt and garlic.

coldMeze.name: WHITE CHEESE
coldMeze.desc: High-quality, full-fat, and creamy white cheese made from the best milk.

coldMeze.name: POTATO SALAD
coldMeze.desc: Freshly boiled potatoes combined with greens and extra virgin olive oil.

coldMeze.name: BEETROOT
coldMeze.desc: Appetizing fresh beetroot slices marinated in a special vinegar sauce.

coldMeze.name: PINK SULTAN
coldMeze.desc: A special appetizer of beetroot and yogurt, enchanting in both color and taste.

coldMeze.name: TUNA WITH CORN
coldMeze.desc: Ocean-breeze tuna perfectly combined with sweet corn kernels.

coldMeze.name: ROASTED PEPPERS
coldMeze.desc: Capia peppers roasted over wood fire with olive oil and garlic.

coldMeze.name: ROASTED EGGPLANT
coldMeze.desc: Smooth roasted eggplant dip carrying the smoky aroma of the fire.

coldMeze.name: CRAB SALAD
coldMeze.desc: Fresh crab meat with a special sauce for seafood enthusiasts.

coldMeze.name: CHAKISDEZ
coldMeze.desc: A Cypriot table essential; crushed green olives with thyme and garlic.

hotMeze.name: HOT APPETIZER SET
hotMeze.desc: A rich combination of our most popular hot starters served warm.

hotMeze.name: BULGUR KOFTE
hotMeze.desc: Traditional stuffed meatballs, crispy outside with spicy minced meat filling.

hotMeze.name: CRAB LEGS
hotMeze.desc: Specially breaded seafood delight, soft inside and crispy outside.

hotMeze.name: GRILLED HALLOUMI
hotMeze.desc: Warm, smoky Cypriot halloumi cheese grilled to perfection.

hotMeze.name: PASTRAMI
hotMeze.desc: Traditional spicy pastrami that comes alive on the grill.

hotMeze.name: SPRING ROLLS
hotMeze.desc: Hand-rolled pastry with a melting warm cheese center.

hotMeze.name: BUMBAR
hotMeze.desc: Traditional Cypriot stuffed intestines filled with spicy rice.

hotMeze.name: HUNTER'S BOREK
hotMeze.desc: A special 'Avcı' style pastry with a rich filling and crispy coating.

hotMeze.name: POTATO KOFTE
hotMeze.desc: Cypriot-style meatballs prepared with fresh potatoes and special spices.

hotMeze.name: TATAR BOREK
hotMeze.desc: Traditional homemade ravioli topped with plenty of halloumi and mint.

hotMeze.name: POTATO CHIPS
hotMeze.desc: Thinly sliced, golden-brown homemade crispy fries.

grills.name: BEYTI WITH YOGURT
grills.desc: Kebab wrapped in special sauce lavaş, served with fresh yogurt and hot butter.

grills.name: BEEF SHISH
grills.desc: Selected beef cuts grilled to a soft, melt-in-the-mouth texture.

grills.name: CHICKEN SHISH
grills.desc: Marinated chicken breast cubes grilled to a golden brown over charcoal.

grills.name: CHICKEN WINGS
grills.desc: Crispy skin and juicy meat, the most enjoyable form of the grill.

grills.name: LAMB CHOPS
grills.desc: The most precious cut of fresh lamb, thyme-scented grilled chops.

grills.name: ADANA KEBAB
grills.desc: Hand-minced meat balanced with spice, a legendary kebab classic.

grills.name: GRILLED MEATBALLS
grills.desc: Delicious meatballs kneaded with special spices, like mom used to make.

grills.name: SHEFTALI KEBAB
grills.desc: Cyprus' world-famous delight; spicy meat feast wrapped in lamb net.

grills.name: OVEN KEBAB
grills.desc: Lamb meat slow-cooked for hours in a stone oven until it falls off the bone.

grills.name: MIXED GRILL 1
grills.desc: A satisfying selection of beef shish, chicken shish, wings, and meatballs.

grills.name: MIXED GRILL 2
grills.desc: A magnificent meeting of beef shish, Adana kebab, meatballs, and chops.

grills.name: FULL MIXED GRILL
grills.desc: A true flavor carnival featuring all our grill varieties.

fish.name: FRIED CALAMARI
fish.desc: Golden breaded crispy calamari served with special tartar sauce.

fish.name: CALAMARI IN FOIL
fish.desc: Soft calamari steamed in foil with butter and fresh herbs.

fish.name: CALAMARI WITH HALLOUMI
fish.desc: Special grilled calamari stuffed with halloumi cheese.

fish.name: FRIED CUTTLEFISH
fish.desc: The most crispy and delicious fried form of fresh cuttlefish.

fish.name: FRIED OCTOPUS
fish.desc: Specially marinated octopus arms, crispy outside and juicy inside.

fish.name: OCTOPUS CASSEROLE
fish.desc: Octopus slow-cooked in a clay pot with vegetables and special sauce.

fish.name: FRIED MUSSELS
fish.desc: Delicious crispy breaded mussels served with dipping sauce.

fish.name: FISH & CHIPS
fish.desc: Classic British style breaded fish with crispy fries and sauce.

fish.name: SHRIMP CASSEROLE
fish.desc: Shrimp served with plenty of butter, garlic, and melted cheddar cheese.

fish.name: FRIED SHRIMP
fish.desc: Fresh shrimps with a light and crispy coating.

fish.name: SHRIMP WITH MUSHROOMS
fish.desc: Perfect harmony of mushrooms and fresh shrimps in a creamy sauce.

fish.name: GROUPER (ORFO)
fish.desc: The noble fish of the Mediterranean; fresh grouper fillet seared on the grill.

fish.name: SEA BASS
fish.desc: The prince of the seas; fresh white meat of sea bass grilled over fire.

fish.name: SEA BASS IN FOIL
fish.desc: Sea bass locked in flavor, cooked in its own juice with vegetables.

fish.name: SEA BREAM
fish.desc: The indispensable taste of fresh sea bream from the grill.

fish.name: SPECIAL SEA BREAM
fish.desc: Gourmet sea bream prepared with our chef's secret recipe and special sauce.

fish.name: VOPPA
fish.desc: The taste of local sea fish, served in its freshest seasonal form.

fish.name: MINERI
fish.desc: The special Mineri of the Mediterranean, known for its firm and tasty meat.

fish.name: SOKAN
fish.desc: The local Sokan fish, enjoyed crispy fried in hot oil.

fish.name: SALMON
fish.desc: Omega-3 rich salmon fillet, seared outside and juicy inside.

fish.name: RED MULLET (MERCAN)
fish.desc: Fresh Red Mullet from the sea to your plate with its delicate meat.

fish.name: STRIPED MULLET (BARBUN)
fish.desc: The golden-fried taste of fresh rock mullets.

combos.name: MIXED MEAT PLATTER (FOR 4)
combos.desc: Giant portion for four; a family-sized feast of all our grill varieties.

combos.name: MIXED MEAT PLATTER (FOR 2)
combos.desc: A platter for two, featuring the most select pieces of our grills.

combos.name: MIXED FISH PLATTER (FOR 2)
combos.desc: For seafood-loving couples; a mix of calamari, cuttlefish, shrimp, and octopus.

combos.name: MIXED FISH PLATTER (FOR 4)
combos.desc: A seafood festival for crowded tables; fresh fish and hot starters together.

fixMenus.name: FIX MEAT APPETIZERS
fixMenus.desc: A full start with 12 types of cold mezes and all our signature hot mezes.

fixMenus.name: FIX FISH APPETIZERS
fixMenus.desc: 12 cold mezes from the sea and seafood-heavy gourmet hot starters.

fixMenus.name: FIX MEAT MENU
fixMenus.desc: Fix meat appetizer content plus a mixed grill feast as the main course.

fixMenus.name: FIX FISH MENU
fixMenus.desc: Fix fish appetizer content plus premium sea fish as the main course.

beverages.name: COCA COLA
beverages.desc: Classic refreshing cola served ice cold.

beverages.name: SPRITE
beverages.desc: Lemon-lime flavored clear carbonated soft drink.

beverages.name: ICE TEA
beverages.desc: Refreshing iced tea with lemon flavor.

beverages.name: AYRAN
beverages.desc: Traditional Turkish yogurt drink, salted and chilled.

beverages.name: ŞALGAM
beverages.desc: Traditional fermented turnip juice, a perfect accompaniment to raki.

beverages.name: FRUIT SODA
beverages.desc: Sparkling soda with natural fruit flavor.

beverages.name: PLAIN SODA
beverages.desc: Sparkling soda water, perfect as a mixer.

beverages.name: LARGE WATER (1.5L)
beverages.desc: Large bottle of natural spring water.

beverages.name: SMALL WATER (0.5L)
beverages.desc: Small bottle of natural spring water.

alcohol.name: CARLSBERG
alcohol.desc: Danish pilsner beer, crisp and refreshing.

alcohol.name: PASQUA WINE (75CL)
alcohol.desc: Italian red wine, full-bodied and rich.

alcohol.name: TEKIRDAG GOLD (70CL)
alcohol.desc: Premium quality Turkish raki, aged to perfection.

alcohol.name: RED LABEL (75CL)
alcohol.desc: Johnnie Walker Red Label blended Scotch whisky.

alcohol.name: BLACK LABEL (75CL)
alcohol.desc: Johnnie Walker Black Label blended Scotch whisky.

alcohol.name: JAMESON (70CL)
alcohol.desc: Irish whiskey, triple-distilled for exceptional smoothness.

alcohol.name: BEYLERBEYI GOBEK (70CL)
alcohol.desc: Premium Turkish raki, double-distilled for purity.
